title: The Chronicles of Leende (Project Vinland)
description:
You can find chapters for The Chronicles of Leende by Tasaki Rei and Usugumo Nezu translated by scanlation group Project Vinland here.

Synopsis: Princess Julia leaves her home of Schrijver, and travels with her father, the leader of an order of knights, to Leende, a place that is said to be cursed. When she meets Tristan, a young man with amber eyes, she begins to rethink her own life, but she soon becomes embroiled in a situation that threatens the kingdomâ€¦
author: Usugumo Nezu
